name: RecommendationNotToChangeDiet
title: Recommendation not to change diet
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for a  procedure that is commonly used to identify recommendation to continue current diet education.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have been given recommendation to continue current diet education. Using the Quality Data Model, this data element will map to the "Communication, From Provider to Patient" datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include codes which represent the procedure of recommendation to continue current diet education. Codes used are SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
